revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Review proofreading corrections, add date note, letter from Mattie Whitman, Alexander Crozier, update Mary Whitman Van Nostrand note.
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
i have received your letter to day the 13t i also got the papers on saturday Saturday i am pretty well but my lameness that is bad enoughf enough my legs pains me real bad some nights i cant can't sleep if i am on my feet much through the day i try to favor myself as much as i can i have got a woman to clean house but it all dont don't seem to doodo) Jeff is here or he aint ain't just here now but he was here this morning he came to new york New York
with mrMr. Crosier one of the commissioners they think of starting to night for st louisSt. Louis i expect him back now very soon he left home last thursday Thursday a week ago to morrow

he says mattyMatty is quite smart that the children aint ain't half as good as they were when matt was away i had a few lines from charleyCharley HeydHeyde the other day he says han is as well as she ever will be that she is not very well that she will write me a letter that she had got mine and your letters it is real warm to day here no more this time georgeGeorge is away i have had a letter from maryMary also i wrote to her of JessesJesse's death
